attributes.action: Change the DVLA road tax prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The DVLA should not be aloud to charge people an extra £11.00 for buying 6 months road tax. The following is an example of what I pay for my road tax

1 full year: £110.00 in total

6 months road tax £60.50

The problem is at present if you purchase two 6 months road tax you pay a total of £121.00
Which means the DVLA make an extra £11.00 and this should not be allowed?

So please sign the petition as the extra £11.00 is unfair
